title: Gross domestic product ( GDP ) growth rate in Greece 2024
yAxis: GDP growth rate compared to previous year
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing GDP growth rate compared to previous year, containing a total of 11 data points.
Overall GDP growth rate compared to previous year has increased over the Year.
GDP growth rate compared to previous year is roughly constant from 2014 to 2015, gradually increasing from 2015 to 2017, and finally roughly constant from 2017 to 2024.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2016 and 2017.
Maximum GDP growth rate compared to previous year, about 2.22 was reported at Year 2020
The lowest GDP growth rate compared to previous year, of value 0.19 was reported at Year 2016
